name: RUPO
tagline: Simulator for evaluation of rural investment and development scenarios for small and micro size farmers. The underlying models and data are based on rural India.
body:
![](http://sostec.io/wp/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/Mother-of-India-poster-edit3.png)

# RUPO | agricultural simulation for small and micro size frames in rural India

#### Simulator for evaluation of rural investment and development scenarios for small and micro size farmers. The underlying models and data are based on rural India.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
